item.title: 欧洲期待北欧太空竞赛减少对美国的依赖
item.description: 位于瑞典和挪威最北部的两个小型太空港正在争分夺秒地从欧洲大陆向太空发射首批卫星，因为该地区希望减少对美国参与者的依赖。【原文：Two small spaceports in the far north of Sweden and Norway are racing to launch the first satellites from mainland Europe into space as the region looks to reduce its reliance on U.S. players.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡服装业对美国征收 30% 的关税感到震惊，希望美国能削减关税
item.description: 一个顶级行业机构周四警告说，如果斯里兰卡无法争取到低于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对来自科伦坡的进口商品征收的 30% 的关税，那么斯里兰卡的服装行业将面临困境。【原文：Distress is in store for Sri Lanka's garments sector if the island nation is unable to clinch a tariff lower than the 30% figure U.S. President Donald Trump has clamped on imports from Colombo, a top industry body warned on Thursday.】

item.title: 台积电第二季度销售额同比增长 38.6%，超出预期
item.description: 全球最大的合约芯片制造商台积电周四公布，第二季度营收为 9338.0 亿新台币（约合 319 亿美元），超过市场预期，原因是人工智能应用领域对该公司产品的需求激增。【原文：TSMC , the world's largest contract chipmaker, reported on Thursday second-quarter revenue of T$933.80 billion ($31.9 billion), beating market forecasts, as demand for the company's products leaps on surging interest in artificial intelligence applications.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Blackstone 和 L&G 建立了高达 200 亿美元的私人信贷合作关系
item.description: 彭博新闻社周四援引 Blackstone 发言人的话报道称，Blackstone 已与 Legal & General 建立私人信贷合作关系，两家公司计划在未来五年内将合作规模扩大至 200 亿美元。【原文：Blackstone has entered into a private credit partnership with Legal & General that the two firms plan to expand to up to $20 billion over the next five years, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing a Blackstone spokesperson.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，亚马逊考虑再向 Anthropic 投资数十亿美元
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周四援引知情人士的话报道，亚马逊正在考虑向人工智能公司 Anthropic 再投资数十亿美元，以加强双方的战略合作伙伴关系。【原文：Amazon is considering another multibillion-dollar investment in AI firm Anthropic to strengthen their strategic partnership, the Financial Times reported on Thursday, citing people with knowledge of the talks.】

item.title: 早间竞价特朗普加征关税并未激起市场波澜
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 中国汽车制造商的价格战和产能过剩损害了财务状况
item.description: 中国汽车行业正因产能过剩和持续的价格战而陷入困境，这引起了监管机构和行业高管的警觉，他们警告说，这场动荡正在损害该行业的长期生存能力。【原文：China’s auto sector is reeling from overcapacity and an extended price war, raising alarm among regulators and industry executives who warn the turmoil is undermining the sector's long-term viability.】

item.title: 阿联酋公司 G42 计划在越南建造价值 20 亿美元的超大规模数据中心
item.description: 据越南国家媒体周四报道，阿布扎比国家支持的 G42 公司计划与越南公司合作，在越南商业中心胡志明市开发一个价值 20 亿美元的超大规模数据中心。【原文：The Abu Dhabi state-backed firm G42 plans to partner with Vietnamese companies to develop a $2 billion hyperscale data centre in Vietnam's business hub Ho Chi Minh City, state media reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 行业电子游戏演员与工作室通过人工智能安全协议
item.description: 演员工会 SAG-AFTRA 在一份新闻稿中说，好莱坞视频游戏配音和动作捕捉演员周三与视频游戏工作室签署了一份新合同，重点是人工智能保护，从而结束了长达近一年的罢工。【原文：Hollywood video game voice and motion capture actors signed a new contract with video game studios on Wednesday with a focus on artificial intelligence protections, the actors' union, SAG-AFTRA, said in a press release, ending a near year-long strike.】

item.title: 印尼与美国在 "积极 "会晤后建立更广泛的关键矿产合作关系，印尼高级谈判代表称
item.description: 印尼首席谈判代表周四表示，印尼与美国代表在华盛顿就即将到来的关税问题举行的会议取得了 "积极 "成果，两国探讨了在关键矿产领域建立更广泛的伙伴关系。【原文：Indonesia's meeting with United States representatives in Washington on the looming tariffs went "positively", its chief negotiator said on Thursday, with both countries exploring a wider partnership in the critical minerals sector.】

item.title: 马斯克表示，特斯拉将在两个月内把机器人出租车服务扩展到旧金山湾区
item.description: 特斯拉公司首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周三表示，特斯拉将在 "一两个月内 "把机器人出租车服务扩展到旧金山湾区，这取决于监管部门的批准情况。【原文：Tesla will expand its robotaxi service to the San Francisco Bay Area "in a month or two", depending on regulatory approvals, CEO Elon Musk said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国行业机构警惕稳定币非法集资风险
item.description: 在市场对加密货币和数字资产趋之若鹜之际，中国一家行业机构对涉及稳定币的非法集资风险发出了警告。【原文：An industry body in China warned against illegal fundraising risks involving stablecoins amid a market frenzy over cryptocurrencies and digital assets.】

item.title: 投资者未受特朗普关税举措影响，英伟达走高助推亚洲股市上涨
item.description: 亚洲股市周四小幅上涨，原因是英伟达（Nvidia）的估值短暂上升到创世界纪录的 4 万亿美元，令投资者感到乐观，而且投资者对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）最新的关税措施基本不予理会。【原文：Asian stocks rose slightly on Thursday, riding on optimism from Nvidia's brief rise to a world-record $4 trillion valuation and as investors largely shrugged off U.S. President Donald Trump's latest tariff salvos.】

item.title: 前外汇事务高级外交官称，日本不太可能面对美国要求日元升值的压力
item.description: 日本前最高货币外交官浅川雅嗣告诉路透社，尽管唐纳德-特朗普总统批评日本对美国的巨额贸易顺差，但日本不太可能面临来自美国的压力而有意走强日元。【原文：Japan is unlikely to face pressure from the United States to intentionally strengthen the yen despite President Donald Trump's criticism of its large trade surplus with the U.S., former top currency diplomat Masatsugu Asakawa told Reuters.】

item.title: 美元喘息，巴西雷亚尔因关税威胁下滑；比特币接近历史新高
item.description: 周四，美元兑主要货币汇率从两周高点进一步下滑，因为唐纳德-特朗普总统最新的关税措施未能撼动市场，但巴西除外，该国威胁征收50%的关税，导致雷亚尔隔夜下跌高达2.8%。【原文：The U.S. dollar slipped further from a two-week high versus major peers on Thursday, as President Donald Trump's latest tariff salvos failed to shake markets, except in Brazil where a threatened 50% levy sent the real sliding as much as 2.8% overnight.】

item.title: 特朗普扩大关税令需求前景黯淡，石油价格下跌
item.description: 由于市场参与者认为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普最新宣布的关税措施威胁到全球经济增长和资源需求，周四油价下跌。【原文：Oil prices dropped on Thursday as the latest tariff announcements by U.S. President Donald Trump were perceived by market participants to threaten global economic growth and demand for the resource.】

item.title: 特朗普宣布从 8 月 1 日起对铜征收 50% 的关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三宣布对铜征收 50%的关税，并在社交媒体上表示，关税将于 8 月 1 日生效，这一决定是在国家安全评估之后做出的。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump announced on Wednesday a 50% tariff on copper, saying on social media that it would be effective August 1 and that the decision was made after a national security assessment.】

item.title: Sunnova 将以 700 万美元的价格向 Omnidian 出售部分太阳能电池板业务
item.description: Sunnova Energy 周三表示，作为跟踪交易的一部分，该公司已同意以 700 万美元现金将其住宅太阳能安装业务的一部分出售给 Omnidian 公司，同时承担部分债务。【原文：Sunnova Energy said on Wednesday that it has agreed to sell a portion of its residential solar installation business to Omnidian for $7 million in cash, along with the assumption of certain liabilities, as part of a stalking horse deal.】

item.title: 澳大利亚向央行数字货币又迈进了一步
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周四表示，它正朝着批发性央行数字货币（CBDC）的方向迈出另一大步，一系列行业合作伙伴正在开展首次使用真实货币和资产的项目。【原文：Australia's central bank said on Thursday it was taking another major step toward a wholesale central bank digital currency (CBDC) with a range of industry partners pursuing projects using real money and assets for the first time.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片初创公司 Groq 讨论 60 亿美元估值，The Information 报道
item.description: 据 The Information 周三援引知情人士的话报道，美国半导体初创公司 Groq 已与投资者洽谈，准备以 60 亿美元的投后估值融资 3 亿至 5 亿美元。【原文：U.S. semiconductor startup Groq has spoken to investors about raising between $300 million and $500 million at a $6 billion post-investment valuation, The Information reported on Wednesday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 交易日：英伟达成为首只市值达 4 万亿美元的股票
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets】

item.title: 消息人士称欧盟与美国贸易谈判将讨论汽车进口配额和出口信贷问题
item.description: 业内消息人士和贸易官员称，布鲁塞尔正在与美国同行讨论一系列旨在保护欧盟汽车业免受美国高额进口关税影响的措施，包括削减关税、进口配额和欧盟汽车制造商对美出口价值抵免。【原文：Brussels is discussing with U.S. counterparts a range of measures aimed at protecting the European Union's auto industry from steep U.S. import duties, including tariff cuts, import quotas and credits against the value of EU automakers' U.S. exports, industry sources and trade officials say.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，欧特克权衡收购工程软件公司 PTC
item.description: 彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道称，欧特克公司正在评估以现金加股票的方式收购竞争对手软件制造商 PTC。【原文：Autodesk Inc is evaluating a cash-and-stock deal for rival software maker PTC , Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普与卢拉公开争吵后对巴西征收 50%关税
item.description: 50%的关税将与所有部门关税分开。【原文：The 50% tariff will be separate from all sectoral tariffs.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，费列罗接近以约 30 亿美元收购 WK Kellogg
item.description: 华尔街日报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，费列罗-罗奇背后的意大利糖果制造商正接近达成一项约 30 亿美元的交易，收购 WK Kellogg。【原文：The Italian candy maker behind Ferrero Rocher is nearing an about $3 billion deal to buy WK Kellogg , the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会的 "加密货币之母 "称代币化证券仍是证券
item.description: 以支持加密货币行业而闻名的美国最高证券监管机构周三表示，被称为 "代币化 "的新证券交易模式仍必须符合其他证券的监管规定。【原文：A top U.S. securities regulator known for her supportive stance on the cryptocurrency industry said on Wednesday that new models for trading securities known as "tokenization" must still meet regulations for other securities.】

item.title: 关税促使 5 月份美国从中国进口的服装创 22 年新低
item.description: 最新的贸易数据显示，5月份从中国进口到美国的服装价值降至22年来的最低月度水平，凸显了美国大幅关税的影响。【原文：The value of apparel imports from China to the U.S. fell in May to its lowest monthly level in 22 years, according to latest trade data, highlighting the impact of steep U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 据 Politico 报道，预计美国国家航空航天局将有 2000 多名高级雇员离职
item.description: Politico 周三援引该媒体获得的文件报道称，美国国家航空航天局（National Aeronautics and Space Adminstration）的约 2,145 名高级雇员将在裁员计划的推动下离职。【原文：Around 2,145 senior-ranking employees at the U.S. National Aeronautics and Space Adminstration are set to leave under a push to shed staff, Politico reported on Wednesday citing documents obtained by the news outlet.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，英国 Revolut 公司正在洽谈以 650 亿美元的估值进行新一轮融资
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周三援引知情人士的话报道称，总部位于伦敦的金融科技巨头 Revolut 正在洽谈以 650 亿美元的估值获得新的融资。【原文：London-based financial technology giant Revolut is in talks to secure new funding at a valuation of $65 billion, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英伟达 4 万亿美元里程碑为股市巨头的崛起画上句号
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp）以惊人的速度崛起，成为首家估值达 4 万亿美元的上市公司，这凸显了人工智能芯片制造商和科技行业对股市的巨大重要性。【原文：The stunning rise of Nvidia Corp to become the first publicly traded company valued at $4 trillion underscores the massive importance to the stock market of the AI chipmaker and the technology sector.】
